name: Jungle Ball Shoot
description:
Jungle Ball Shoot is a most marbles classic and amazing marble shooter. The goal is to clear out of marbles the screen

How to play:
1. Shooting to match three or more marble balls.
2. Tap on the transmitter can swapping the current ball and the next ball.
3. Make more Combos and Chains to get the higher score.

Game Features:
1. Swap the shooting marble to match three or more of the same color to get three purple star.
2. Multiple type of paths and position.
3. Use props to help you pass each levels.
4. Well designed levels and cool music and sound effects.
